name: KnockDownGame
description:
Knock Down is that game which re-make the "Throw Ball" game, the game is made by Unreal 4. Knock down is a physic game and it works to all age.

Input:

player need to use cursor and drag the ball and throw it. 

Every round has 5 balls that player can use. If players cannot knock the jars in 5 balls, they will lose.
